name: Hands vs Mosquitoes
description:
"Hands vs Mosquitoes", my game for the #GMTKjam!

„𝘸𝘦 𝘸𝘰𝘳𝘬 𝘣𝘦𝘴𝘵 𝘸𝘩𝘦𝘯 𝘸𝘦 𝘢𝘳𝘦 𝘴𝘶𝘥𝘥𝘦𝘯𝘭𝘺 𝙟𝙤𝙞𝙣𝙚𝙙 𝙩𝙤𝙜𝙚𝙩𝙝𝙚𝙧“ ― 𝐻𝒶𝓃𝒹𝓈

It can take up to 1 minute to start the detection model and the camera...and should work also on smartphones, but a PC, laptop or tablet is recommended! If you don't have a webcam you can use an app like DroidCam!

This game is entirely controlled by your body (hands and face) a camera is required

Suggestion: fullscreen and then zoom with ctrl + mouse wheel or something equivalent to fill the entire screen

Only one person at a time can be detected, you can't (yet) squish the mosquitoes on your face, only with both hands!

Works best on Firefox (in my experience)

If you don't understand how to play it check this video out:

I wrote this game in javascript interacting with the html canvas context on top of a tensor flow movement detection model called "blazemove"

You can find more info on this kind of real time movement detection here!
